home.becomeACustomerDescr: Discrover Upsilon's world and contact us now to become a customer!
home.requestServiceDescription: Discover the world of UPSILON and contact us today!
home.headerText2: Elevate your research and decision-making with Upsilon, our all-in-one-solution.
home.contactModalTitle: Contact us to learn more about Upsilon!

solutions.description: Explore our solutions starting from survey creation to reporting.
solutions.serviceDescription: Expert review, comprehensive data collection services, powerful analytics, and custom reports all in one place
solutions.surveyDesignDescription: Explain to us your needs and study objectives and our team will design your entire survey.
solutions.surveyReviewDescription: Our team of researcher experts will evaluate the quality & accuracy of your survey and provide constructive feedback and recommendations.
solutions.dataCollectionDescription: Our data collection services offer a verstail approach, utilizing multiple methods to suit your research objectives.
solutions.dataReviewDescription: We review data to identify and rectify any potential errors ensuring the delivery of comprehensive, precise, and seamlessly integrated data.
solutions.analysisDescription: From in-depth statistical analysis to insightful visualizations, we transform raw data into actionable insights.
solutions.reportsDescription: Unlock the full potential of your data with our custom-made reporting and analytics. Tailored to your specific needs, our reports proved in-depth insights and actionable recommendations.

how_use.title: Three ways of survey design​
how_use.info: Choose the easiest way to create a survey

list.title: Create your survey​
list.info: You can use our survey building tool to create your own survey from scratch

list.title: Find pre-made  templates​
list.info: Choose from a  wide selection of our survey templates available in our library

list.title: Let us create your survey​
list.info: ​We can design your own customized survey based on your requirements and needs

service_survey.title: Upsilon services​
service_survey.info: Integrated value-chain that starts with exploration, design, execution, and ends with results

list.head: Survey design
list.info: You can choose from pre-made templates, create your own from scratch, or enlist the help of Upsion’s team​

list.head: Data collection
list.info: Don’t know how to reach your target audience? Upsilon’s experts can deliver your surveys to accurately reach your target audience

list.head: Review and Audit
list.info: We review and audit the responses of the target audience to reach correct and accurate results

list.head: Analysis and Report
list.info: Study the survey responses by viewing the statistics and reports provided for Upsilon users
